pageContent: MMEA - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS...CONSCIOUSNESS TO BECOME GOD. Part 3 of 4Title: M.M.E.A. - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS SEEN BY OCCULTISTS AS "TRANSCENDENCE", A MEANS BY WHICH MANKIND SHALL MAKE THAT "PARADIGM JUMP" IN CONSCIOUSNESS TO BECOME GOD! - Part 3 of 5Resources to aid your UnderstandingMark of the Beast: Final Connections Video New World Order Religion: The Apostate Church 2-Tape SeriesSubtitle: "The Brain Machine Interfaces Program will create new technologies for augmenting human performance through the ability to noninvasively access codes in the brain in real time and integrate them into peripheral device or system operations ... This technology is just another church, a place to worship ... The kingdom of God is within us all, so these technologies are expanding the environment ... God is all powerful love. You can do no wrong when the spirit of love, the Holy Spirit is with you. " ["Technical Jesus"]The New World Order is coming! Are you ready? Once you understand what this New World Order really is, and how it is being gradually implemented, you will be able to see it progressing in your daily news!! Learn how to protect yourself, your loved ones! Stand by for insights so startling you will never look at the news the same way again. YOU ARE NOW ON THE CUTTING EDGE In the past two articles, we have reported on an implantable chip called M.M.E.A. - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY -- that is operated through the new technology called "The Brain Machine Interfaces Program".This new chip is far more advanced than the VeriChip , and is completely capable of fulfilling all the prophecies of the "Mark of the Beast" in the Book of Revelation. Let us list these first two articles, so that if you have not yet read them, you may stop here and read them before you proceed.* NEWS1875 - "D.A.R.P.A. IS FUNDING AN IMPLANTABLE M.M.E.A. chip FAR MORE ADVANCED THAN"DIGITAL ANGEL"! M.M.E.A. - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS SO ADVANCED IT CAN FULFILL REV 13:16-18!" Part 1 of 4 - We explain the science of this implantable chip* NEWS1875b - "D.A.R.P.A. IS FUNDING AN IMPLANTABLE M.M.E.A. chip FAR MORE ADVANCED THAN"DIGITAL ANGEL"! M.M.E.A. - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS SO ADVANCED IT CAN FULFILL REV 13:16-18!" Part 2 of 4 - The fact that this unbelievable chip is being funded by the very government department who will one day take our freedoms away, and whose ultimate goal is the New World Order - Kingdom of Antichrist - tells us that this chip is probably planned to be the chip the Masonic Christ and his False Prophet will one day force every person on earth to take as a sign of loyalty to him! Remember, the essence of the Biblically-prophesied "Mark of the Beast" is worship. Let us see what the Bible says about the worship of the Mark of the Beast."And the third angel followed them, saying with a loud voice, If any man worship the beast and his image, and receive his mark in his forehead, or in his hand, The same shall drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is poured out without mixture into the cup of his indignation; and he shall be tormented with fire and brimstone in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb: And the smoke of their torment ascendeth up for ever and ever: and they have no rest day nor night, who worship the beast and his image, and whosoever receiveth the mark of his name." [Rev 14:9-11; Emphasis added]http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875c.cfm (1 of 6)12/15/2003 6:23:24 PM

MMEA - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS...CONSCIOUSNESS TO BECOME GOD. Part 3 of 4Thus, you can see that prophecy ties the taking of the "Mark of the Beast" into worship of that Beast.Do we see an element of worship tied in to "The Brain Machine Interfaces Program", the program that drives M.M.E.A.? We certainly do, and that is the subject of this exciting article! We shall be quoting throughout this article from a website entitled, "Technical Jesus", at: http://www.technical-jesus.comEternal Spiritual Growth"This website is dedicated to an exciting prospect. Soon, a wise culture will use technology to apply the full power of love and so enter a state of hyper-evolution. They will enjoy continually diminishing hardship, and eternal spiritual growth. God's will in this matter is revealing itself in todayâ€™s quickening changes imposed by the forces that guide our society: science, technology, spirituality, and even economics."This is the statement of purpose from this website. A careful reading of this paragraph reveals that "a wise culture will use technology" in order to achieve "eternal spiritual growth" which will reveal "God's will in this matter". Thus, this new technology will lead directly to a tremendous spurt of "spiritual growth" in all of mankind. According to this occult view, the very physical interconnectedness that this technology delivers will increase mankind's "love" for one another. What kind of person is against "love"? Therefore, this argument for implanting everyone with M.M.E.A. will focus on "LOVE"!Let us now see how this "love" can be achieved through M.M.E.A."We need Technology to crack this nut. It is a good tool for extending our selves ... Maybe we could tinker with our genetic makeup? I suggest that all hell would break loose. Mental evolution is the answer. Consider that the mind is our essence, and it is connected to the body only out of necessity ... Our mind is connected to the world through our senses and we are capable of extending and augmenting our senses with technology. Eventually the mind will cross this interface, enter a new environment and transcend the body." ["The Interface is the Temple", http://www.technical-jesus.com/interface.htm]This paragraph almost makes it sound like the occultist views the human body as a liability to spiritual growth, for, after all, "the mind is our essence"! Since the days of Sir Francis Bacon and the rise of Rosicrucianism , occultists have literally worshipped Science, believing that this pursuit would finally deliver man to his eternal life; this current viewpoint on the Brain Machine Interface is simply the latest example of this belief.Note the last sentence, for the viewpoint it states is most important in our understanding: : "Eventually the mind will cross this interface, enter a new environment and transcend the body." Let us review another article in this website to see the tremendous importance the occult places upon this current line of scientific exploration."There is no doubt we are growing to understand the world at a rapid pace. An elegant way of looking at the outcome of positive growth is that we are growing towards a social singularity. A Social Singularity is defined as transcendence to an eternal and accelerating growth of understanding. I think a social singularity is the natural outcome of life in this world. Please consider how this can come about:1. A living thing is conditioned to exist and grow.2. Understanding the laws of nature increases a living thing's chance to exist and grow. 3. Science is the systematic process of understanding nature. 4. Technology is the application of our understanding of nature to better adapt to our environment. ["Science", http://www.technical-jesus.com/Science.htm]This "social singularity" spoken of here is nothing more, nor less, than the Absolute Dictatorship of Antichrist! When the dictatorship is referred to by this euphemism, it doesn't sound too bad, does it?http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875c.cfm (2 of 6)12/15/2003 6:23:24 PM

MMEA - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS...CONSCIOUSNESS TO BECOME GOD. Part 3 of 4As we stated earlier, Rosicrucianism began in the mid-fifteenth century to systematically study nature and just as systematically record their observations. This thorough approach has helped produce our explosion of scientific knowledge these past 500 years. However, from the beginning, Rosicrucianism taught that this study of Nature was to be the manner by which man was to achieve the ultimate in "Alchemy" -- eternal life.Listen to an explanation of the role of Science in our everyday life:"In the end, all technology is prosthesis, the extension and augmentation of existing biological and informational capabilities. We put eyeglasses in front of our eyes to bring the world into focus, telescopes and microscopes to see those realms which our unaided eyes cannot fathom. We use remote sensors to explore the planets, and these are all extensions of the senses we have. All of our systems of writing and of calculation are similarly extensions of memory systems and logical operations that we can perform in our minds. Similarly the technological implements that carry us from one place to the next, or that grow our food for us, or that keep us warm are but extensions of our own bodies' effectors." - Peter Cariani - [Ibid.]Now, let us see how this explanation is now inexplicably expanded from the physical to the spiritual:"Through computer and sensor evolution our technological tools are turning into a place where we can extend our senses to better understand the word of God. This is a spiritual process is known as natural revelation. Technology is a place to expand your mind, and find truth, for those who wish it. There is talk of uploading our minds into this environment and living forever."Oh, my, what a dramatic jump in assumption this paragraph represents! "Technological tools" are seen as extending mankind's senses so he can "better understand the word of God"! What kind of nonsense is this? To understand what these occultists are speaking of, you must understand that they are not talking of the same "Word of God", i.e., Holy Bible as we are when we use this term; they are not speaking of the Divinely-Inspired, Inerrant Bible.Rather, they are speaking of the revelation of the Divine within Nature. Occultists call this "Natural Revelation"!This Natural manner of looking at life and eternal life is seen in yet another unbelievable statement:"As with all science the next step is to come to understand the natural principles behind this phenomena. Then the next step is to develop the technology to further "subdue the world" with God's resonating help ... If you want to enter the kingdom of heaven just knock on the door. Just try. Turn your will to it. " ["Mapping God's Plan: Knocking on Heavens Door...If you are not trying, you are dying", http://www.technical-jesus.com/interrelationships.htm]What blasphemy! No one can "will" their way into Heaven; only Jesus decides who enters His Heaven and who does not. No person can ever, ever "will their way into Heaven". Yet, this is the lie of which Satan has convinced so many very intelligent men -- including brilliant scientists -- and some day will be foisted upon all mankind. Now, you can see how the following prophecy can be fulfilled:"And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world." [Rev 13:8]"And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads: 17 And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name." [Rev 13:16-17]When all the peoples of the world have this M.M.E.A. Chip in them, all will worship the beast! But, before Antichrist and his minions can force this chip into everyone, most people have to be convinced that they will receive great and valuable benefits, including eternal life! What a lie Satan has created! Yet, it is the same lie Satan told Eve in the Garden:"Yea, hath God said ...? [Gen 3:1] Casting doubt on God's commands"Ye shall not surely die ... ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil." [Gen 3:4-5]When a lie works well, Satan knows he can just continue telling it, right to the very end of time!CONVERGENCE LEADS TO SALVATION"Convergence leads to salvation. Salvation is:http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875c.cfm (3 of 6)12/15/2003 6:23:24 PM

Liberation from the competitive and destructive aspects of life (Transcendence) 3. Eternal life with ever increasing enlightenment (Hyper Evolution)This M.M.E.A. chip is seen leading to "convergence" and hence, to "salvation" simply because each chip will be controlled by an RF signal that will enable Illuminati handlers to simultaneously cause each member of selected populations to think and to feel, and possibly, even do, the same thing at the same time. We have discussed this issue in Part 1, where a test was conducted which created an RF cloud over the entire city of Athens, Georgia. This convergence is seen as positively wonderful, and as leading to eternal life. At this point, mankind "converges", becoming one and entering into "eternal life with ever increasing enlightenment".Let us now see how this convergence is symbolized.http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875c.cfm (4 of 6)12/15/2003 6:23:24 PM

MMEA - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY IS...CONSCIOUSNESS TO BECOME GOD. Part 3 of 4This picture shows four (4) separate entities:1. Individual -- "I Am"2. Others -- "Your Are"3. World -- "The world is"4. Forgiveness ["Convergence", http://www.technical-jesus.com/Convergence.htm]When a convergence of all four entities is achieved, either through spiritual transcendence, or through technological transcendence, each of these circles is conjoined, forming the "Connected Perfect Interaction By Selfless Love". At this point, mankind is joined in a flat existence in "Selfless Love"!But, then, by exercising "Growth by Faith" in the technology of this M.M.E.A. chip , a conjoined mankind suddenly achieves "Eternal Transcendence", as mankind shoots straight upward towards eternal "heaven on earth" in the best of occult tradition!CONCLUSION Suddenly, at the very time we are seeing so many End Times prophecies being fulfilled, we see the emergence of the M.M.E.A. chip, a most sophisticated insert that can fulfill every requirement of Revelation 13:16-18. The most important of this capability is the ability to control entire populations, to make them all feel the same feelings, the same emotions, the same thoughts at the same time.But, finally, this M.M.E.A. chip is being touted at the occult spiritual level as having the capability to "save" all mankind. However, not to just save mankind, but to deliver eternal life without that Jesus Christ so noxious to all occultists. However, occultists believe their approach will result in "living forever" by the process of "uploading our minds into this environment"! With this occult approach, and with every person on earth having one of these implants, mankind will enter this "eternal life" as a single entity! Thus, when Antichrist and his False Prophet force everyone on earth to take this chip , they will promise everyone on earth that by taking this chip , they will live forever!What person in his or her right natural mind would not be attracted by this glittering promise?Truly, the End of the Age is upon us!Are you spiritually ready? Is your family? Are you adequately protecting your loved ones? This is the reason for this ministry, to enable you to first understand the peril facing you, and then help you develop strategies to warn and protect your loved ones. Once you have been thoroughly trained, you can also use your knowledge as a means to open the door of discussion with an unsaved person. I have been able to use it many times, and have seen people come to Jesus Christ as a result. These perilous times are also a time when we can reach many souls for Jesus Christ, making an eternal difference.If you have accepted Jesus Christ as your personal Savior, but have been very lukewarm in your spiritual walk with Him, you need to immediately ask Him for forgiveness and for renewal. He will instantly forgive you, and fill your heart with the joy of the Holy Spirit. Then, you need to begin a daily walk of prayer and personal Bible Study.If you have never accepted Jesus Christ as Savior, but have come to realize His reality and the approaching End of the Age, and want to accept His FREE Gift of Eternal Life, you can also do so now, in the privacy of your home. Once you accept Him as Savior, you are spiritually Born Again, and are as assured of Heaven as if you were already there. Then, you can rest assured that the Kingdom of Antichrist will not touch you spiritually. If you would like to become Born Again, turn to our Salvation Page now. We hope you have been blessed by this ministry, which seeks to educate and warn people, so that they can see the coming New World Order -- Kingdom of Antichrist -- in their daily news. http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875c.cfm (5 of 6)12/15/2003 6:23:24 PM
